skills.desc:
Removes all [Heal Reduction] debuffs from all allies, then removes 1 random debuff from all allies, then heals all allies by 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP.

If all allies are dead, revives them with 50% HP, then fills their Turn Meters by 50% instead.
skills.name: Uugo's Brew
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Level 7: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff and a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn whenever this Champion’s last living ally is killed.
skills.name: Final Spite [P]
